snippet: Jake Layman scored 18 points, Diamond Stone had 15 points and 10 rebounds, and the Terrapins never trailed in securing their eighth straight victory.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; Maryland men's basketball team routs Rutgers, 88-63; other men's and women's scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Jake Layman scored 18 points, Diamond Stone had 15 points and 10 rebounds, and the Terrapins never trailed in securing their eighth straight victory.

headline.print_headline: Maryland Routs Rutgers; Xavier Gets Past St. John’s
